channel.title: My 317 cache weird problem
channel.description: I have added auto cache downloader to my 317 and it downloads correctly to your c drive but every time i run my client it always re downloads the cache and it says connection error after its done.

item.title: My 317 cache weird problem
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

Vodzila:

I have added auto cache downloader to my 317 and it downloads correctly to your c drive but every time i run my client it always re downloads the cache and it says connection error after its done.

The cache probably doesn’t unzip correctly, are you sure you set all the right directory’s in sighnlink.java and client.java.

Read full topic
